subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2334 has been delivered
description_text:
I just received my pedals and there is 0 hardware for the baseplate. All
the pedal hardware is accounted for but no package with nuts/bolts/washers
for the baseplate. Order# SSN2334 Charles Hubbard

conversations.body_text: Hi Chuck Hubbard,    Please take a photo showing all the items you received, and we will forward it to our warehouse staff for confirmation.

Partially installed. But the only bag of hardware I got was for the pedals
themselves. No hardware for the baseplate.
[image: image.png]


On Tue, Aug 19, 2025 at 10:17 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Chuck Hubbard,    Sorry, we have arranged for a replacement to be sent to you. Here is your tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045868044385
